author: PaulHigin
body:
This change adds StdError handling for the new SSH transport so that any connection failure from SSH will be reported to the user.  Currently a connection failure results in a "hang" and Ctrl+C is needed to close the (not yet connected) session.

SSH also returns warnings through StdError and these are filtered so that the session is not unnecessarily closed.
title: Fix for issue 1528: SSH based remoting does not handle errors during connection attempt
